choices: The cat sat on the mat.
The mat sat on the cat.
Sat the mat on the cat.
On the sat mat cat the.
answer: The cat sat on the mat.

Which of the following sentences is in passive voice?
choices: She completed the project on time.
The project was completed on time.

The project will be completed soon.
answer: The project was completed on time.
